title: Hospital Details
subtitle: World-class healthcare facilities
internationalServicesDesc: is a preferred destination for international patients, offering comprehensive and personalised care:
infrastructureDesc: is equipped with state-of-the-art infrastructure and technology, delivering world-class healthcare.

services.preArrivalConsultation: Pre-arrival Consultation and Case Review: Medical opinions and treatment cost estimates from senior consultants.
services.visaAssistance: Visa & Travel Assistance: Medical visa invitation letters and support for travel arrangements.
services.airportPickup: Airport Pick-up/Drop-off: Complimentary transportation is arranged from and to the airport.
services.multilingualInterpreters: Multilingual Interpreters: Professional interpreters are available for communication.
services.dedicatedCoordinators: Express Check-in, Dedicated Lounge & Personal Coordinators: Fast-tracked services and continuous support.
services.accommodationAssistance: Assistance with Accommodation and Food Arrangements: Help with hotels/guesthouses and customised meal plans.
